about_the_game:
This is a pack of whopping 108 fantastical enemy graphics (incl. size differences and color variations) in one package to satiate all your battle needs! A perfect monster pack at a bargain!
Also as a bonus, the pack include 3 well-designed background images to spice up the battle scene! A must have pack for creating a classical and convincing fantasy setting game and perfect for both normal and boss battles!

＜Contents＞
Original monster images (including color variations, large and small sizes) x 108
3 bonus battle backgrounds (battlebacks1 x 1, battlebacks2 x 1, integrated battle background graphic x 1)

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
